Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kananjalo Sabohlwaya abantu bakwaFir’awn ngeminyaka yembalela nonqongophalo lweziqhamo (nezityalo) khon’ukuze bakhumbule (baqiqe)

Kodwamaxaonkekufikaokulungileyokubobabedlangokuthi: “Oku kokwethu,” ze xa behlelwe kokubi bakuthabathe ukuba ngumhlola (weshwangusha) odibene noMûsâ nabo bakunye naye. Nakanye, inene imihlola ivela kuAllâh koko abaninzi kubo abazi
Bathi kuMûsâ: “Enokuba ungeza nowuphi na umqondiso khon’ukuze wenze ubugqi kuthi, asisokuze sikholwe kuwe thina.”
Ke kaloku Sathumela isikhukula kubo, iinkumbi, iintwala, amasele, negazi ukuba zibe yimiqondiso kubo kodwa bona bathi gqolo ukuba nenkukhumalo, kananjalo bona baya babangabo bangabenzi bobubi

Ke kaloku sathi isohlwayo sisakuba phezu kwabo, (baqala) bathi: “Hini na Mûsâ sicelele eNkosini yakho ngenxa yesithembiso saYo kuwe. Ukuba usisusile isohlwayo kuthi, thina siya kukholwa kuwe inene nangeyaniso, yaye siya kubakhulula aBantwana bakwaSirayeli bahambe nawe.”
Kodwa Sathi Sisakusisusa isohlwayo kubo ixesha elimiselweyo ekwakufuneke befikelele kulo, khangela ke! Basaphula isithembiso sabo
Sathabatha impindezelo Thina kubo. Sabatshonisa elwandle, kuba baphikisa imiqondiso yeThu ababi nankathalo ngayo

Kananjalo Senza abantu ababecingelwa ukuba akukho yabo yangaboabaphilailifaiziphalukazomhlabaeziseMpumalanga neziphaluka zawo eziseNtshonalanga eSasizisikelele. Ke kaloku ilizwi elilungileyo leNkosi yakho lazaliseka kuBantwana bakwaSirayeli, ngenxa yokunyamezela kwabo. Kananjalo Sayitshabalalisa yaphela nya imisebenzi emikhulu nezakhiwo zakwaFir’awn ezazakhiwe ngabantu bakhe

Sabuyisa aBantwana bakwaSirayeli ngokunqumla ulwandle, (endleleni) badibana nabantu ababezinikele kunqulo lwabo lwezithixo. Bathi (aBantwawa bakwaSirayeli): “Hini na Mûsâ senzele nathi uthixo njengoko nabo benoothixo.” Wathi yena: “Inene, nina ningabantu abangazi nto.”
“Aba bantu baza kutshatyalaliswa ngenxa yale nto bazinikele kuyo. Yaye yonke imisebenzi yabo ayinto yanto.”
Wathi yena: “(Nina nithi) mandinifunele omnye uthixo ngaphandle koAllâh, ekubeni Yena Enenze nangentla kunendalo yonke?”
Yabonani Thina Sanihlangula kubantu bakwaFir’awn, ababeningcungcuthekisa ngesona sibi isohlwayo, bebulala oonyana benu bashiye abasetyhini benu, olo lwaba luvavanyo olukhulu oluvela eNkosini yenu
